title: CoolCo to boost LNG carrier fleet with Idan Ofer’s quartet
dc:creator: Adis Ajdin
description: LNG carrier owner Cool Company (CoolCo) has revealed plans to buy four vessels from Quantum Crude Tankers, an affiliate of Idan Ofer’s Eastern Pacific Shipping (EPS) and its largest shareholder. A spinoff of Tor Olav Tr√∏im’s Golar LNG said it would pay around $660m for two modern two-stroke 174,000 cu m vessels Kool Firn and …
